quote.registrar: Computershare Hong Kong Investor Services Ltd.
quote.issuer_name: Datang Environment Industry Group Co., Ltd. - H Shares
quote.nm: Datang Environment Industry Group Co., Ltd. - H Shares
quote.summary: Datang Environment Industry Group Co Ltd is a China-based company mainly engaged in environmental protection and energy-saving solutions. The company mainly operates through four segments. Environmental Protection and Energy Conservation Solutions segment mainly includes flue gas desulfurisation and denitrification facilities concession operation for coal-fired power plants, the manufacture and sale of denitrification catalysts, engineering for coal-fired power plants, water treatment, and others. Renewable Energy Engineering segment mainly includes the engineering general contracting for newly-built wind power plants, biomass power plants and photovoltaic power plants. Thermal Power Engineering segment mainly includes the engineering procurement construction (EPC) services for thermal power plants. Other businesses segment mainly includes various businesses such as fiberglass chimney anti-corrosion and air cooling system engineering general contracting.
